Merge pull request #238 from artem-tim/master

Added anchor to custom event context
Added anchor to custom event context

Merge pull request #215 from jaguadoromero/fix_issue_#186

Avoid having to set inline styles to hide modal by default. Fix #186

Add `this.blur()` to manual AJAX example

Because the modal cannot infer the anchor that triggered the open, we must explicitly blur it. Otherwise the link remain focused and the modal will be re-triggered each time the `return` key is hit.

Merge pull request #214 from garybenade/patch-1

Make sure `this.anchor` is always defined so it can be blurred later. Fixed `TypeError: Cannot read property 'blur' of undefined`
Avoid having to set inline styles to hide modal by default. Fix issue #186

Recommend cdnjs for hosting

So people stop hot-linking to me ... !

Update jquery.modal.js

if the popup is triggered using jquery .modal() and not via an <a> link, line 88 throws an error because the anchor variable is not set
Revert back to last working commit

Fix #198 pressing enter key on modal
Fix #198 pressing enter key on modal

Merge pull request #206 from DevDaveo/patch-1

Tiny changes (reported by my IDE)
Added syntax modes to code samples (closes #47)

Bind to links with multiple `rel` values

Resolves #135

Make modal more responsive-friendly

Use % for width, apply a max-width in pixels, and use border-box sizing
so the modal doesn’t break vertically at narrow viewports.

Add $.modal.getCurrent() to retrieve current instance (if any)

Resolves #178

Merge pull request #37 from bensmithett/master

Namespace automatic click event handlers
Namespace automatically attached click event listeners
Should fix #34 (Multiple Modals) without breaking anything...
Update README & examples to show that manually opened AJAX modals must be wrapped in a div with class "modal"
no newline at end of file
Added example to demo. Minified js.
Option for adding additional classes to the close button
Bumped to 0.5.1 - new Ajax complete event.

Merge pull request #22 from dei79/master

Added a new AJAX Event
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:kylefox/jquery-modal into ajax
Only create spinner where necessary, remove from DOM when "hidden"
Renamed AJAX events, updated README to document spinner & ajax events.

Merge pull request #21 from adrianolaru/spinner

Spinner Custom Events

Added spinner custom events

Named them SHOW_SPINNER and HIDE_SPINNER.
Cached body selection as a side effect.

Merge pull request #20 from adrianolaru/spinner

Spinner code

Added spinner support

- Spinner is not optional. I see it as a missing part of the modal.
- Spinner uses a css class .modal-spinner which by default adds
  a spinner background image but if you want to show text or HTML,
  you can use the $.modal.defaults.spinnerHtml option.
- If AJAX get request fails, the spinner is closed and the modal will
  not appear.

Merge pull request #18 from RyanonRails/patch-1

Missing comma :D
Manually fix #17 (Made code more object oriented)

Merge pull request #16 from adrianolaru/bugfixing

Bug fixing

Bug fixing

* Fixed resize example by using the new $.modal.resize() method
* Centering modal after applying modalClass styles.
  This fixes the case where a modal element doesn't have a modalClass set.
* Added event parameter to $.modal.close which got lost on the way
* Replaced self with this as we're in the same scope
* Simplified GET request

Merge pull request #13 from adrianolaru/bugfixing

When invoking manually, make sure the $ selection is not empty

When invoking manually, make sure the $ selection is not empty

I was just checking to see what happens when invoking the modal manually, and I used the $('#sticky') example from examples. As we don't have a #sticky element in the DOM, the modal just display the blocker.

Merge pull request #11 from adrianolaru/bugfixing

Made plugin chainable

Merge pull request #10 from adrianolaru/change-public-api

Moved static methods from $.fn.modal to $.modal
Manually bringing in 9f11170 from adrianolaru (closes #4 and #10)

Merge pull request #9 from adrianolaru/bugfixing

Minor bug fixing

Moved static methods from $.fn.modal to $.modal

Introduced a new object $.modal which does most of the things and added static properties to it.
We now have:
* $.modal.defaults
* $.modal.close
* $.modal.resize
* $.modal.BEFORE_CLOSE (and other constants)

Minor bug fixing

'this' is the jQuery object inside fn, no need to wrap it another $ object
use the constant for close event name

Merge pull request #8 from adrianolaru/new-events-methods

Replaced bind/unbind and live with on/off methods

Changed bind/unbind and live with on/off methods

As of jQuery 1.7, the .on() and .off() methods are preferred to attach and remove event handlers on elements.
Fix #7: pass jQuery to anonymous function and accept as '$' in argument
remove current class on modal close

Merge pull request #5 from elidupuis/master

A minor speed improvement?
Fixed #3 (use outerHeight), bumped to 0.2.3. Also dropped the packed file.
Fix issue #2 -- "Close" button element wasn't being removed when modal was closed.
Added an image ... *sigh*.  Bumped version to 0.2.1 (will start doing patch version increments for minor fixes).
Added detection for AJAX links, updated README.
Added $.modal.resize().  All it does at the moment is re-centre the modal (because there is no fixed height on the modal, it will stretch vertically).
Events are now triggered on the modal element itself.  Modals are automatically bound to links with rel="modal:open".
Fix: modal position should be fixed, not absolute.
Added auto-binding based on "rel" attributes and an example page.
